description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	

	Bugs:

SLIDESNET-34806       Gray lines near main backgroung image
SLIDESNET-34761       SmartArt shapes failed to render in Aspose.Slides cloned presentation
SLIDESNET-34717       Slide transition effects are lost when presentation is saved using Aspose.Slides
SLIDESNET-34683       All slides have a mark at the center of the footer for generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34608       Slide animations effects are disturbed on cloning sliides
SLIDESNET-34427       Images are improperly rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34168       Pie chart image has black shadow after converting PPT to PDF
SLIDESNET-34113       Presentation gets corrupted on updating Oleframe data
SLIDESNET-33885       SmartArt Text formatting lost on cloning slides with SmarArt
SLIDESNET-33683       The text inside the SmartArt is improperly rendered
SLIDESNET-32905       Wrong text color in smartart objects


	Exceptions:

SLIDESNET-34738        Argument Null Exception on cloning Aspose.Slides saved presentation
SLIDESNET-33127        ArgumentException on accessing presentation


	Regressions:

SLIDESNET-34689        Chart series lines are not removed from chart
SLIDESNET-34239        Chart category axis get cropped in generated thumbnail
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
